title: Disappointing
review: I was really looking forward to this film and avoided reading any reviews so as not to be swayed or influenced in any way..... I needn't have bothered! It just isnt scary in any way, shape or form and for the majority of the film, nothing happened. A couple of moments during the film I jumped a little but over all, I could not wait for it to be over. The ending is ridiculous too.

title: Great film
review: I seem to be one of few who didn't rate the cartoon so don't feel it necessary to compare the two. It's a great film and Will Smith as the genie is funny and camp. Go see it; you don't be disappointed.
